title: Fix a crash when there is no GL context
body:
**Description of Change**

Fix the case where some platforms try and read the GL context without first  checking if there is one.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #632

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
